EmailTemplate.description: AutoResponse email when a case is created for automated or premium monitoring
EmailTemplate.name: AutoResponse - NOC Monitoring
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Stream Alert {!Case.CaseNumber} [ {!Case.Thread_Id} ] {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LIVE STREAM MONITORING ALERT
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Our Network Operations Center has identified a potential issue impacting your live stream. We will contact you with more details shortly. A case was created with the following information:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Opened on: {!Case.CreatedDate} Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Feel free to reply to this email with questions.
Best regards, The Brightcove Network Operations Center
You can see all of your cases in our Support Portal, and current system status is always available on our Status Page.
